title: Igor Kuivjogi Fernandes
text: Hi! My name is Igor Kuivjogi Fernandes and I’m working as a Graduate Research Assistant at the Agricultural Statistics Lab at the University of Arkansas. On this website, you can see my thoughts and papers associated with my research.

title: Welcome To My Blog

title: About
text:
Originally from São Paulo, SP, Brazil, Portuguese native speaker, but now living in Arkansas, US. After working for some time in the industry right after high school, I decided to start a bachelor’s degree in Statistics at the Federal University of Goiás (Brazil’s midwest), wherein in my last two years I was an undergraduate researcher at Embrapa Rice and Beans 1. We analyzed agricultural data and tried to make sense of environmental drivers in the yield of rice and beans and I started to like to work with agricultural statistics. Now I’m doing a master’s degree in Statistics and Analytics at the University of Arkansas.
My first programming language was C, followed by R and Python.



Footnotes


The Brazilian Agricultural Research Corporation in charge of coordinating research and development of rice and beans, two crops that are extensively grown in Brazil.↩︎
